name: Typo Type
description:
Do you think you're good at typing? play this and try to get a score of 10000, I think you won't be able to LOL..... Suck :D

How to play :

Just type the text listed on the board and match the text to get a score, don't let the other text keep running until it gets a red line! Capital and small words are noticed.

Credit :

Made by ChillyField (Darius Subaga)

Made with Gdevelop

Backsound :

Btw this game is for Desktop, I'm sorry :D

PLAYING IN FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED
